frame.name: Legality
frame.definition:
<def-root>Words in this frame describe the status of an <fen>Action</fen> with respect to a <fen>Code</fen> of laws or rules. An <fen>Object</fen> may also be in violation or compliance of the <fen>Code</fen> by virtue of its existence, location or possession.
<ex> <t>Illegal</t> <fex name="Action">drug use</fex> is on the rise. </ex>
<ex> Scores of <t>illegal</t> <fex name="Object">immigrants</fex> cross the border every year.</ex>
<ex> <fex name="Action">Feeding the buffalo</fex> <m>is</m> <t>prohibited</t> <fex name="Code">according to Code 138</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Action</fen> is the behavior which complies with or violates the <fen>Code</fen>.<ex> <t>Illegal</t> <fex name="Action">drug use</fex> is on the rise. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Code
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Code</fen> is the set of rules, laws or regulations that determine whether the <fen>Action</fen> is allowed or prohibited.</def-root>

FE.name: Object
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Object</fen> complies with or violates the <fen>Code</fen> by virtue of its existence, location or possession.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. </def-root>
